item.title: Code Sample
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Daniel Borg)
item.description: Hej fr√•n Castle Coding! The following are two code samples using syntax highlighting. The following is a code sample using triple backticks ( ``` ) code fencing provided in Hugo. This is client side highlighting and does not require any special installation. var num1, num2, sum num1 = prompt("Enter first number") num2 = prompt("Enter second number") sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string The following is a code sample using the “highlight” shortcode provided in Hugo.
